column5: Hi all, After a fun day watching sucker fish in the creek with my boy, he wanted to go fishing in front of the house after supper. I had an hour to spare before night shift so we had a short family fishing session on the lawn. Jack has a new rod and 'taco' box (thats how he pronounces 'tackle', he does his best to mimic my accent....lol). The walleye we are catching are spawned out males.....still waiting for the big pike to make an appearance. Supper tomorrow night is looking good!
Great picture but the video is marked as private. (Did you include the link to a "special" video?  )
LOL..special videos....whatever do you mean Blair?   Anyhoo...yup....had privacy set wrong...should be able to view now
That's just awesome Simon!!!  and the dinner bell on the rod tip........I'm diggin it!!
Love the video Simon!  Jack's expression after that cast is priceless.
~~~~Great now I know who' got my Taco Box
just classic .... whatta cast !!!! and dinner right at your doorstep .... awesome
Man that is awesome! Fish like that right in front of the house...
Love the video , great job Jack
Yep, unbelievable that you can catch walleye right of your front lawn. Great cast Jack!!!
Going to have to wait until Saturday for my first walleye dinner. I'll beep when I pass by Simon
